newsitem.title: HONG KONG: China's Zhenye jumps on rights issue.
newsitem.headline: China's Zhenye jumps on rights issue.

text.p: Shares of property developer Shenzhen Zhenye Co Ltd rallied on Thursday after an announcement of an aggressively priced rights issue.
The stock was trading at 16.16 yuan per share at 10.05 a.m. (0205 GMT), up 1.34 yuan, or 9.04 percent. Volume hit 4.26 million shares.
Zhenye would make a three-for-10 rights offer at 12 yuan per rights share, it said in a statement in the Shenzhen-based Securities Times.

"The price of the issue is rather high, I think the underwriter is very confident about the company's property portfolio," Song Bin, an analyst at Central-South Securities Co, told Hong Kong-based China Securities Bulletin newsletter.
